headline.main: TV: Commentators Stunned by President's Action

results.snippet: TELEVISION and radio commentators, who normally rank high for instant loquacity, were stunned into virtual incoherence by President Johnson's dramatic statement that he would not seek or accept renomination. The announcement, which was not included...
results.lead_paragraph: TELEVISION and radio commentators, who normally rank high for instant loquacity, were stunned into virtual incoherence by President Johnson's dramatic statement that he would not seek or accept renomination. The announcement, which was not included in the prepared text of the President's remarks, caught the media authorities with their expertise down.

headline.main: 44 COUNTRIES SIGN ASTRONAUT PACT; Rescue and Aid Is Provided for Those Going Astray

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 22 -- The United States, the Soviet Union and 42 other nations signed a treaty today to assure international cooperation in the rescue of any astronaut who has to return to earth outside his own national territory.
